column4: a little harsh since we're here to help experienced and inexperienced alike..
its harsh but imagine being asked how to reinstall grub over and over and over and over again
I have.. and other qeustions as well.. you have the choice of not answering or beginning the conversation with them
well regardless what people think, the fact is that newbies asking the same questions over and over again without reading wikis or any of the extensive documentation online slows everything down.
